paragraphs: Hey there!  Weclome to my website!

This is an accumulation of work that I've done over the years, not only as a software developer, but also as a creator.  I love crafting beautiful user experiences and am constantly expanding my expertise in various interests.
I currently operate out of Cleveland, OH, living with a few roommates and my tuxedo cat Biscuit.
Have a peek into my world.  Below you can view an interactive timeline of my experience as a professional software developer.
